name: Amica
description:
All your life, you’ve been cursed, but you’ve finally found a way to break it. You must now travel the land, searching for the necessary components for the spell while helping people along the way. You play a little black cat, on the search for a cure for his instability. Meeting people and finding items to help you on your way.

This is a more complete version of the Ludum Dare 49 submission.

Credits:

Josh Garman - Level design and unwrapping, Character animation, Environment art

Courtnie Kahrl - Character art, Environment art
